app.title: FixPic
app.footer: FixPic - AI background removal powered by Replicate, watermark removal powered by Dewatermark.ai

descriptions.aiRemoveBg: AI-powered background removal, automatically detect and remove any background, generate transparent PNG
descriptions.removeWatermark: AI-powered watermark removal, automatically detect and remove watermarks, logos, and text from images
descriptions.removeFakeTransparency: Convert fake transparent backgrounds (gray-white checkerboard) from AI tools like Lovart, Midjourney to real transparent PNG
descriptions.compress: Compress images and convert formats, supports WebP, PNG, JPEG
descriptions.resize: Precisely adjust image dimensions, supports aspect ratio preservation

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.dragDrop: Click or drag to upload image
upload.dropHere: Drag images here, or click to select
upload.batchHint: Supports PNG, JPG, WebP, batch processing available

process.processingHint: This may take a few seconds

options.pngLossless: PNG is lossless, no compression needed
